source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot shows the exterior of a large, two-story brick house under an overcast sky. The house features Tudor-revival architectural elements, including a section with white stucco and dark timber framing. A black metal fence runs along the front of the property, which is landscaped with a green lawn, shrubs, and several trees. The camera slowly zooms in on the timbered detail of the house.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: Please remove the word "slowly" from the caption.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: Please remove the word "slowly" from the caption.

source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot shows the exterior of a large, two-story brick house under an overcast sky. The house features Tudor-revival architectural elements, including a section with white stucco and dark timber framing. A black metal fence runs along the front of the property, which is landscaped with a green lawn, shrubs, and several trees. The camera zooms in on the timbered detail of the house.

generated_critique: The caption is overly descriptive of the static scene, which goes against the instruction to be brief for scenery shots and to focus on motion. It includes excessive detail about the house's architecture and landscaping ("Tudor-revival architectural elements," "black metal fence," "landscaped with a green lawn, shrubs, and several trees"). The description of the motion ("The camera zooms in...") is correct but is buried at the end of a long paragraph. The caption should be revised to be more concise, briefly setting the scene before describing the camera's zoom, which is the only movement in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A shot of a large, brick Tudor-style house under an overcast sky, as the camera slowly zooms in on its timbered details.
